main.name: Kathiressan
main.bio: Hi there! I am Kathiressan! You can call me Kathi. I studied Computer Science, majoring in Data Science from Multimedia University Cyberjaya. I decided to study Computer Science because of my initial love for web development. Recently, I rediscovered that love after learning ReactJS. Today, my skills in Data Science and Web Development are vast. I have done many Data Science projects and even more Web Development clones / builds. Go ahead and drop me a message to collaborate.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me now!

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree of Computer Science (Hons.) (Data Science)
education.description: Graduated with Second Upper Class Honours

work.title: Data Science Internship
work.description: Studied and created Model Interpretability scripts for regression and classification Machine Learning models. Created scripts for Linear Regression, Polynomial Regression, and Naive Bayes models. Created Unit Testing scripts to test individual units of source code to determine if they are fit for use. Used u-test to compare the statistical similarity between datasets. Other data exploratory work was also done.

testimonials.text: He is able to work independently and look for solutions by himself.
